dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6793 IH: Small Business Ceiling Fan Manufacturer Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Brecheen (for himself, Mr. Burlison, and Mr. Good of Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit further action on the proposed rule entitled Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Ceiling Fans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Ceiling Fan Manufacturer Protection Act.

section.header: Prohibiting implementation of proposed rule entitled Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation for Ceiling Fans
section.text: The Secretary of Energy may not take any action to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Ceiling Fans (88 Fed. Reg. 40932 (June 22, 2023)) or any future proposed rule of a substantially similar nature.
